DOC.brief_summary: This study is conducted in Europe. The purpose of this study is to assess the impact on daily life for children new to using a growth hormone injection device.
DOC.brief_title: Usability and Tolerability of the Norditropin NordiFlex® Injection Device in Children Never Previously Treated With Growth Hormone
DOC.criteria: Growth hormone (GH) treatment naïve subjects for whom it has been decided to initiate GH treatment prior to enrollment into the study Subjects who receive Norditropin NordiFlex® according to the SPC Known or suspected allergy to study product(s) or related products Child and/or parent unable to give consent or fill out the questionnaires The receipt of any investigational medicinal product within 3 months prior to this study Suffer from a lifethreatening disease
